media.title:
Robotry finds
new eco-friendly
solutions
with paper
media.tablet.description:
One of the biggest global envrionment concern is reducing the use of plastic products.
Yet unlike plastic container, there have been no substitute for the cup lid itself.
For that reason, Roborty undertake a project to develop alternative product
that has competitive advantage to existing plastic cup lids.
